beginning.protagonist: Our protagonist, a young warrior named Kai,
beginning.world_description: wakes up in a mysterious world where time doesn't move. All around him are creatures of light and shadow,
beginning.conflict_status: engaged in an unending static conflict.

ending.creatures_living_harmoniously: both light and shadow creatures can live harmoniously,
ending.portal: finds a portal to return home,

synopsis.setting: In a world where time has come to a halt,
synopsis.protagonist_journey: Kai, a young warrior, discovers himself in the midst of an eternal conflict between light and shadow creatures.
synopsis.quest: He embarks on a journey to unravel the secret to stirring time. Along the way, he battles incredible adversaries,
synopsis.meaning_of_harmony: and discovers the true meaning of harmony.
